articles.title: Britain's Queen Elizabeth seen in face mask for first time during public ceremony
articles.description: Britain's Queen Elizabeth II has worn a mask for the first time while appearing in public during the pandemic.

articles.title: Watch people across the world celebrate Joe Biden's win
articles.description: From impromptu trumpet solos to dancing in the street, President-elect Joe Biden's victory over President Donald Trump sparked worldwide celebrations.

articles.title: A small Irish town claims victory after Biden wins
articles.description: The stars and stripes have been fluttering all week on the streets of Ballina -- the town of just 10,000 in the west of Ireland where US president-elect Joe Biden's Irish ancestors hail from.
